original_text: So we are also sending Judas and Silas to you. They will tell you the same things that we have written in this letter.
korean_text: 그리하여 유다와 실라를 보내니 그들도 이 일을 말로 전하리라

sentences.original_text: So we are also sending Judas and Silas to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 우리 또한 유다와 실라를 당신들에게 보냅니다

sentences.original_text: They will tell you the same things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신들에게 똑같은 것들을 말할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that we have written in this letter
